attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hard working people are being taxed to the hilt by a government that squanders money. There is no incentive for hard working people. We are being financially stretched to the limit by a government that does not care about its own people. What about the human rights of the workers? Or do we not have any unless we are lazy drug addicts and criminals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
